item.title: Personal tech radar
item.description:
I made my personal Tech Radar. It's a bit different from the Thoughtworks Tech radar. I changed the rings definition and it's less suggestive and more personal. It's mainly to help me see where I stand now and where I want to go with my skills in the near future.

I will make a new radar in 6 months to see how things have changed. It should be interesting, at least I hope :).

item.title: Jekyll and github
item.description:
Was looking for some hosting to create my own personal site.

Thanks to suls.org for telling me about Jekyll and github pages. https://pages.github.com/.

Quite neat.

Made me rememeber when I made an html static page generator with VB 6 for creating a tourism company website. In 2002?
